Name: La Garde de Nuit (The Night's Watch)
Ingredients: 5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Fragata Green Olive & cucumber slice.
Review: Cognac with red berry and red wine notes with faint honeycomb.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Matthew Long at Lulu White, Paris, France. Matt's original recipe called for Chouchen Hydromel mead wine from Brittany and Gentiane de Lure.
Nutrition: One serving of La Garde de Nuit (The Night's Watch) contains 172 calories
